org.jewelsea.willow.navigation

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jewelsea.willow.navigation.History

  • public class History
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages history for a browser tab.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      History(BrowserWindow browser)
      create a new history tracker for the given browser window

    • Method Detail

      • canNavForwardProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty canNavForwardProperty()

      • canNavBackwardProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyBooleanProperty canNavBackwardProperty()

      • canNavForward

        public boolean canNavForward()
        Returns:
        true if the current browser location is not at the end of the history list.

      • canNavBack

        public boolean canNavBack()
        Returns:
        true if the current browser location is not at the beginning of the history list.

      • requestNav

        public java.lang.String requestNav(java.lang.Integer index)
        Returns:
        the location of the provided history index or the current location if the provided index is out of the current history index range

      • requestNavForward

        public java.lang.String requestNavForward()
        Returns:
        the next location in the history list or the current location if there is no such element

      • requestNavBack

        public java.lang.String requestNavBack()
        Returns:
        the previous location in the history list or the current location if there is no such element

      • executeNav

        public void executeNav(java.lang.String newLoc)
        updates the history list to reflect a navigation to the given location.

      • createShowHistoryMouseEvent

        public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> createShowHistoryMouseEvent(javafx.scene.Node displayNode)
        Show a history menu when the user right clicks.
        Parameters:
        displayNode - the node under which the history menu is to be displayed.
        Returns:
        a right click mouse button event handler which will show a history context menu.

      • createShowHistoryActionEvent

        public javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> createShowHistoryActionEvent(javafx.scene.Node displayNode)
        Show a history menu when the clicks a history button
        Parameters:
        displayNode - the node under which the history menu is to be displayed.
        Returns:
        an action event handler which will show a history context menu.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu(javafx.scene.Node displayNode)
        show the history menu below the provided node (history button).
        Parameters:
        displayNode - the Node below which the menu will be shown.
